SourceString: Primary Attack
Attack with your weapon dealing <b>{data.WeaponDmgScale_UI}|floor()%</> Weapon Damage.\r\nOn use gain <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> while you have an <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> skill equipped.
Tailwind

<b>+{ProjPenetration}|round()</> <me_Penetration>Projectile Penetration</>.
<b>{ProjSpeedMod_UI}|round()%</> more Projectile Speed.
<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Ranged only.
<b>+{ProjPenetration}|round()</> <me_Penetration>Projectile Penetration</>.\r\n<b>{ProjSpeedMod_UI}|round()%</> more Projectile Speed.\r\nRanged only.
Volley

You have a <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to <me_FireDam>fire</> <b>+{ProjMod}|round()</> additional Projectiles in a cone.
Additional Projectiles deal <b>{SideDmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less Damage and have <b>{SideDmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.
<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Ranged only.

You have a <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to <me_FireDam>fire</> <b>+{ProjMod}|round()</> additional Projectiles in a cone.\nAdditional Projectiles deal <b>{SideDmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less Damage and have <b>{SideDmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\nRanged only.
Enhanced Ailment

<b>+{AilmentAddMod_UI}|round()%</> added Base <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\n<b>{AilmentMoreMod_UI}|round()%</> more <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost
Punish
<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage against <me_Channel>Channeling</> or Incapacitated enemies.
Vitality Drain
Deals <b>{VitDmgMod_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage as extra <me_VitalityDam>Vitality Damage</>
Indomitable

On ability start become Indomitable for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.
Indomitable grants <b>+{Armor}|round()</> <me_Armor>Armor</> and when an enemy hits you within a <b>{Range_UI}|round()m</> range, deal <b>{WeaponDmgScale_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage to it.
<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Melee only.

On ability start become Indomitable for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.\nIndomitable grants <b>+{Armor}|round()</> <me_Armor>Armor</> and when an enemy hits you within a <b>{Range_UI}|round()m</> range, deal <b>{WeaponDmgScale_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage to it.\nMelee only.
Hamstring
On hit <me_Slow>slows</> enemies by <b>{Slow_UI}|round()%</> for <b>{SlowDuration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.\nMelee only.
On hit <me_Slow>slows</> enemies by <b>{Slow_UI}|round()%</> for <b>{SlowDuration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.\nMelee only.
Onslaught
Gain <me_Rage>Rage</> on first enemy hit.\n<b>{ASMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> more Attack Speed per <me_Rage>Rage</>.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Gain <me_Rage>Rage</> on first enemy hit.\n<b>{ASMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> more Attack Speed per <me_Rage>Rage</>.
Fire Explosion

<b>{ConversionMod_UI}|round()%</> Damage converted to <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</>.\nOn hit <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to deal <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius with <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|round()%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.

<b>{ConversionMod_UI}|round()%</> Damage converted to <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</>.\nOn hit <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to deal <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius with <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|round()%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.
Heavy Impact

<b>{ConversionMod_UI}%</> Damage converted to <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</>.\nOn hit <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to deal <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.

<b>{ConversionMod_UI}%</> Damage converted to <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</>.\nOn hit <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to deal <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Lightning Strike

<b>{ConversionMod_UI}|round()%</> Damage converted to <me_LightningDam>Lightning Damage</>.\n<b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to trigger a <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strike</> on the first enemy hit.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.

<b>{ConversionMod_UI}|round()%</> Damage converted to <me_LightningDam>Lightning Damage</>.\n<b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to trigger a <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strike</> on the first enemy hit.
Frost Explosion

<b>{ConversionMod_UI}|round()%</> Damage converted to <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</>.
<b>{FreezeChance_UI}|round()%</> chance to <me_Freeze>Freeze</> for <b>{FreezeDuration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.
Hits against <me_Freeze>frozen</> enemies deal <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.

<b>{ConversionMod_UI}|round()%</> Damage converted to <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</>.\n<b>{FreezeChance_UI}|round()%</> chance to <me_Freeze>Freeze</> for <b>{FreezeDuration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.\nHits against <me_Freeze>frozen</> enemies deal <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Toxicity

<b>{ConversionMod_UI}|round()%</> Damage converted to <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</>.\nOn hit deals <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</> equal to <b>{WeaponFactor_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage every second for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> (non-stacking).\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.

<b>{ConversionMod_UI}|round()%</> Damage converted to <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</>.\nOn hit deals <me_PoisonDam>Poison Damage</> equal to <b>{WeaponFactor_UI}|round()%</> Weapon Damage every second for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> (non-stacking).
Shield Attack
Deals <b>{DmgMin}|round() - {DmgMax}|round() <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</></> instead (scales with <me_Armor>Armor</>)\r\nRequires Shield
Attack with your shield dealing {AbilityDamage[Dmg1]} (scales with <me_Armor>Armor</>).\r\n{DescriptionComponent[OverwhelmBasic]}\r\nRequires shield.
Retaliating Attack
Deals <b>{RetDmgMod_UI}|round()%</> <me_Retaliate>Retaliation</> Damage as extra Damage\nMelee only
Barrier

Create a <b>Barrier</> around you that absorbs damage and decays over time.
Total is determined by your <me_FreeBarrier>Free Barrier</> and <me_EnergyBarrier>Energy Barrier</>.
On cast, consume <b>{data.CostMP_UI}|round()</> Energy to gain up to <b>{Owner.MaximumBarrier}|round()</> Barrier.
Cost is based on <me_BarrierConversion>Barrier Conversion</> Rate
(<b>1</> Energy = <b>{Owner.ConversionRateBarrier}</> <me_EnergyBarrier>Energy Barrier</>).
DevComment:
Consume up to <b>{data.CostMP_UI}|round()</> Energy to gain up to <b>{Owner.MaximumBarrier}|round()</> Barrier.
(<b>{data.EnergyBarrier_UI}|round()</> Energy Barrier + <b>{Owner.FreeBarrier}|round()</> Free Barrier)
Energy consumption is based on Conversion Rate:
<b>1</> Energy = <b>{Owner.ConversionRateBarrier}</> Energy Barrier

SourceString: Invigorating Guard
For <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</> after use, you heal for <b>{HealPerc_UI}|round()%</> of Damage Taken
Reflecting Guard
For <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</> after use, reflect <b>{ReflectPerc_UI}|round()%</> of Damage Taken from Hits as <me_TrueDam>True Damage</>.
Guard

<b>{BarrierDecayMoreMod_UI}|round()%</> increased global <me_BarrierDecay>Barrier Decay Rate</>.
<b>{FreeBarrierMoreMod_UI}|round()%</> increased global <me_FreeBarrier>Free Barrier</>.
On use Barrier Decay is paused for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.
<b>{CDMod}|round()s</> Base Cooldown Duration.
Cooldown starts after <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.
On use Barrier Decay is paused for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.\nCooldown starts after <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.
Preparation

Cast Time <b>{CastTime}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.
Cannot be used during Incapacitation.
<b>{MaxBarrierMoreMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Total Barrier.
<b>{BarrierDecayMod_UI}|round()%</> less global <me_BarrierDecay>Barrier Decay Rate</>.
Barrier Heal
<b>{MaxBarrierMod_UI}|round()%</> reduced Total Barrier.\nRegenerate Health per second equal to <b>{Heal_UI}|round()%</> of Current Barrier.
Regenerate Health per second equal to <b>{Heal_UI}|round()%</> of Current Barrier.
Ailment Cleanse
On use <me_Cleanse>cleanse</> all <me_Ailment>Ailments</>.
Enduring Barrier

<b>{BarrierDecayMod_UI}|round()%</> less global <me_BarrierDecay>Barrier Decay Rate</>.\nFor <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</> after use, generate <b>{BarrierGain}|round()</> Barrier every second.
For <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</> after use, generate <b>{BarrierGain}|round()</> Barrier every second.
Fast Barrier
<b>{BarrierConversionMod_UI}|round()%</> increased global <me_BarrierConversion>Barrier Conversion</> Rate.\n<b>{CDMod}|round()s</> Base Cooldown Duration.
Fleeting Barrier
<b>{BarrierDecayMod_UI}|round()%</> increased global <me_BarrierDecay>Barrier Decay Rate</>, <b>{MaxBarrierMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Total Barrier.
Rage Gain
On use gain <b>{RageGain}|round()</> <me_Rage>Rage</>.\nFor <b>{Duration}|round()s</> after use, gain <b>{BarrierGain}|round()</> Barrier whenever you gain <me_Rage>Rage</>.
Permanency

Turns the skill into a sustained skill.
No Cooldown. No bonuses on use.
While active grants you <me_BarrierDecay>Barrier Decay Threshold</> equal to <b>10%</> Barrier.
While active regenerate <b>2%</> Barrier per second if you haven't taken Damage in the last <b>2s</>.
Reserves <b>50</> Energy

While active grants you <me_BarrierDecay>Barrier Decay Threshold</> equal to <b>10%</> Barrier.\r\nWhile active regenerate <b>2%</> Barrier per second if you haven\'t taken Damage in the last <b>2s</>.
Barrier Regeneration
While active grants you <me_BarrierDecay>Barrier Decay Threshold</> equal to <b>{BarrierDecayThresholdPerc_UI}%</> Barrier\r\nReserves <b>+{MPReservationMod}</> Energy
Barrier Decay Threshold
While active grants you <me_BarrierDecay>Barrier Decay Threshold</> equal to <b>{BarrierDecayThresholdPerc_UI}%</> Barrier\r\nReserves <b>+{MPReservationMod}</> Energy
Dodge
Quickly dash a short distance toward the target location.\r\nWearing Light <me_Armor>Armor</> or Medium <me_Armor>Armor</> grants increased Dodge Cooldown Rate.
Cooldown Charge
<b>+{CDChargeMod}|round()</> Cooldown Charge(s).
Distance
<b>{TravelDistanceMod_UI}|round()%</> more Dodge Distance.
Speed
<b>{TravelSpeed_UI}|round()%</> more Dodge Speed.\n<b>+{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=2)s</> Intangibility Duration.
Teleport

Phase to target location. Travel Time <b>0.1s - 0.3s</> depends on Travel Distance.\nOn use <me_Cleanse>cleanse</> <me_Root>Root</>.\n<b>+{CDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.

Phase to target location. Travel Time <b>0.1s - 0.3s</> depends on Travel Distance.\r\nOn use <me_Cleanse>cleanse</> <me_Root>Root</>.\r\nWearing Light <me_Armor>Armor</> or Medium <me_Armor>Armor</> grants increased Dodge Cooldown Rate.
Celerity
After Dodge ends gain <b>{SpeedMod_UI}|round()%</> increased All Speed for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.\n<b>+{BaseCDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.
After Dodge ends gain <b>{SpeedMod_UI}|round()%</> increased All Speed for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.
Celerity
Increased All Speed
Dash Attack

After use, gain <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Damage and <b>{CritChance_UI}|round()%</> increased Crit Chance for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.\n<b>+{BaseCDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.
After use, gain <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Damage and <b>{CritChance_UI}|round()%</> increased Crit Chance for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.
Increased Damage and Critical Hit Chance for a short duration
Fire Explosion

Cause an explosion at your start and end location dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\n<b>+{BaseCDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.
Cause an explosion at your start and end location dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Cold Explosion

Cause an explosion at your start and end location dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.\n<b>+{BaseCDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.
Cause an explosion at your start and end location dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Flow
After use gain <me_Flow>Flow</>.\n<b>+{BaseCDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.
After use gain <me_Flow>Flow</>.
